codes.CCTR: Identifies the validation rules related to the Russian Cross-border Transactions Currency Control Reporting
codes.ITRP: Identifies the validation rules related to the invoice tax reporting
codes.MMSR: Identifies the validation rule scheme related to the ECB Euro Money Market Statistical Reporting
codes.SMMD: Identifies the validation rules related to the Bank Of England Sterling Money Market Daily Reporting

description: Specifies the external validation rule identification scheme name code in the format of character string with a maximum length of 4 characters.
name: ExternalValidationRuleIdentification1Code
